content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] We did not agree on a final price because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, did not accept the price I was willing to pay. I offered 860 euros, but he insisted on 875 euros, which I was not willing to pay.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future at 6, given that we were quite close to an agreement but did not reach it due to the price difference.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point of the negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi
